thread.title: Mid America RV Hosts 6-Day Open House from 20-25 July
thread.title_full: Mid America RV Hosts 6-Day Open House from 20-25 July

author: prbuzz.com
title: Mid America RV Hosts 6-Day Open House from 20-25 July
text:
Mid America RV, one of the premier RV dealers in the four states area, today announced that it will host a 6-day open house, which will take place non-stop from the 20th to 25th of July at their dealership (refer to the exact address below).
In the 6-day open house, there will be manufacturers’ representatives especially present for the attendees that wish to learn more about recreational vehicles in general or a particular RV model. From the simplest type to luxury RVs, Mid America RV carries all the finest and highest quality recreational vehicle models in America at present, which includes the RV Summerland, Springdale, Carriage, Altitude, Surveyor, R-Pod, Rockwood, Columbus, Elevation, Sunset Trail and Rushmore models to name a few. These are some of the things open house guests can learn more about at the event. Along with a diverse selection of rvs Mid America RV is celebrating it’s 10 year anniversary. As a thank you to their customers they will be offering special savings on everything in stock.
If that sounds interesting enough to discover more about recreational vehicles, Mid America RV’s open house that’s taking place starting on the 20th of July is the place to go. Aside from the highly knowledgeable team from the RV dealership company, Mid America RV, itself, guests will moreover be able to have informative discussions with the representatives of the aforementioned manufacturers.
In addition, Mid America RV and its vendors – NTP-Stag, Arrow, CrossRoads, Keystone, and Forest River – have also prepared some exciting freebies and giveaways which will surely be enjoyed by the open house attendees. You can also join them for lunch on Friday and Saturday for hamburgers and hotdogs.
Mid America RV is strategically located at the heart of mid west in the great state of Missouri, just south of Carthage, MO. For additional information, refer to the contact details below or visit the Mid America RV’s website http://www.midamericarv.com/
Contact Details
Mid America RV
Address: 5439 S. Garrison
Carthage, Missouri 64836 USA
Phone/Fax: 417 358 4640
Website: http://www.midamericarv.com/
